createTask.description: Create a new planner task with title, assignments, due date, etc.

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the task to be created

props.name: assignments
props.description: Select users to assign the task to. If left empty, the task will be unassigned.

props.name: dueDateTime
props.description: The due date and time for the task

props.name: percentComplete

props.name: priority
props.description: The priority of the task between 0 and 10, with the increasing value being lower priority (0 has the highest priority and 10 has the lowest priority).

props.name: startDateTime
props.description: The start date and time for the task
